::Shredder::

Shredder walks through the forest, a bit bored. Magmatron had his own base, 
why should he need a new one? Walking past a tree, he sees something. He 
frowns, looking down at it. It looked familiar....

Shredder looks back the way he came. He was in a clearing, one that had 
hosted a short battle sometime in the past. Shredder frowns. He remembered 
something like that, back in the days under Zenyak's rule.... The thought 
about Zenyak surprised him as he realized that he had not seen his ex-leader 
in quite a long time. He makes a mental note to scan for him .... and kill 
him when he is found.

Again, he looks down at the metal heap, reaching down to brush away some 
moss, and revealing a predacon simble. He frowns again, recognizing the 
decapitated bot that laid at his feet. It was Fractyl... He looks back at the 
clearing. There had stood the ship that had killed Fractyl during their 
assault on it, now gone somewhere.

Shredder shruggs, walking off again into the forest.
